titleInfo.title: Title from back of photograph: __Home of A Jacobs, 16th Welton St.

physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on the back of the photograph: ''Cheltenham School, March 1978, Colfax and Irving, Demolished end of 1978, Donor Charles McNamara.''

mods.abstract: The building stood at the corner of Irving Street and West Colfax Avenue. Many of the Jewish children living in the west Colfax neighborhood went to Cheltenham. The Cheltenham School was demolished in 1978.
mods.note: Copy donated by the photographer Charles McNamara.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
